abstract: Supreme Court considers whether to hear appeal of former Illinois Gov Rod R Blagojevich, who is serving 14-year prison sentence after his conviction on corruption charges.
lead_paragraph: Former Gov. Rod R. Blagojevich of Illinois could soon learn whether the United States Supreme Court will hear an appeal of his conviction on charges of corruption.
snippet: Former Gov. Rod R. Blagojevich of Illinois could soon learn whether the United States Supreme Court will hear an appeal of his conviction on charges of corruption.
